data.title: Volkswagen Service Plans
data.meta_description: Want to plan your Volkswagen servicing out for the future? Doing so can be an easy way to reduce cost and increase reliability! See more online!
data.text:
CARS UNDER 1 YEARS OLD

For cars under 1 years old that haven’t yet had their first service.

This covers the first two consecutive services with an option to pay upfront or spread over 24 monthly payments.

If your car is under 1 year old and you want to have all your general maintenance work and tyre cover included as well, consider a Fixed Cost Maintenance plan.

Standard Plan Touareg Plan Upfront Payment £492.00 £684.00 Monthly payment £20.50 x 24 months £28.50 x 24 months ID. Range Plan eGolf and eup! Plan Upfront Payment £372.00 £240.00 Monthly payment £15.50 x 24 months £10.00 x 24 months

ENQUIRE NOW

Important information :

1. Terms and Conditions apply. Available for vehicles aged 1-15 years. For vehicles under 200,000 miles. Touareg plans available separately. Consecutive services only limited to the coverage shown. Servicing must be carried out in line with the requirement of the service schedule and all work must be completed at a Volkswagen Authorised Repairer. Service Plan validity dependent on required payments received. Additional work, including wear and tear, is excluded. Offer may be varied or withdrawn at any time. Freepost Volkswagen Financial Services.

2. Valid for vehicles aged 3 to 6 years, with a 2.0L engine or less and under 100,000 miles at activation. Terms, eligibility criteria and exclusions apply. Valid MOT required. Excludes electric vehicles and vehicles with an existing service plan. Vehicles that have been out of a warranty (that has been provided by Volkswagen UK or Volkswagen Financial Services) for more than 30 days will have a no-claim period of 30 days at the start of their policy. The All-in Warranty does not cover any vehicle already covered under any other guarantee, insurance, warranty and/or gesture of goodwill. Volkswagen Financial Services.

3. Saving based on differential between cost of All-in plan with national pay as you go RRP pricing for servicing, MOT and Roadside Assistance. Complimentary Warranty value is based on the average 2 year cost of Extended Warranty policies (with All Component Cover, unlimited mileage, and £0 excess) sold Jan to Sep 2022 for Volkswagen vehicles aged 3 to 6 years, with a 2.0L engine or less, and that have not been out of warranty for more than 30 days. Actual saving will be dependent on your vehicle.

All prices listed are Manufacturer’s ‘On the road’ Recommended Retail Price (includes VAT, VED, Delivery to retailer, number plates and first registration fee). Volkswagen may change RRPs at any time (this includes where there are government changes in regulation and/or legislation). There may be a delay to any RRP displaying correctly on our materials. The vehicle specification shown on the website may vary as Volkswagen UK review the model range line up throughout the year. Please ensure that you clarify the exact vehicle specification and prices with your Volkswagen Retailer at point of order.
